analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#128) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#225-261)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#341-363)
	- generateTokens (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#434-449)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#453-470)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#534-538) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#274-292):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#289-291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#291)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#569-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#578)

Escapable.escapeHatch (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#814-828) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(escapeHatchDestination,balance) (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#825-827)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#501-502) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#542-546)

Reentrancy in GivethCampaign.doPayment (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#925-943):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.controller() != 0) (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#929-930)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#935)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#534-538)
	- /unique_contracts/0x486681bb877703e4385c8fe9688bff776cbc11c4.sol#536-538
